flowershop

Class Bundles

  • java.lang.Object
    • flowershop.Bundles

  • public class Bundles
extends java.lang.Object
    The Bundles class contains a list of bundles.

      • getBundles

        public Bundles getBundles(int[] quantities)
        Retrieves the list of bundles that matches the criteria of quantities saved in an array of ints.
        Parameters:
        quantities - An array of integers representing quantities of the bundles, e.g. 3, 4, 5
        Returns:
        Bundles An object representing the bundles. Null if not found.
